forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 67. West southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon unfolds under a brilliant sun, casting a gentle warmth that invites you outdoors. With a high hovering around a mild 67 degrees, the west southwest wind whispers through the streets at 16 mph, creating a refreshing contrast as it mingles with the burgeoning warmth of the day. The atmosphere is largely clear, leaving little room for fog, though a hint of the marine layer lingers in the distance, cradling the Golden Gate Bridge with soft, elusive shadows.

As twilight approaches, temperatures will descend to a comforting 54 degrees, ushered in by partly cloudy skies. This evening promises a pleasant reprieve, perfect for a stroll along the waterfront or gathering with friends at a cozy café. Consider lightly layering your attire; a light jacket may suffice as the winds pick up and day transitions to night. Engage with the evening by exploring the hidden gems of the city—perhaps a bookstore tucked away in North Beach or a quiet nook in Golden Gate Park where you can soak in the last vestiges of sunlight.
